Name: Stone In Galaxy
About the game: You are an experimental scientist. Who wants to learn the physics of space. Running a stone in a special chamber, the experiment goes out of control. The stone begins to destroy everything around. Do not let the stone fly out of the camera beating it. Classic timekiller in the space setting. Fight off a flying stone with a platform. Hold on by faith. Use mouse for control platform.
